text: Etot klevetnik slushayet ayaty Korana, soderzhashchiye istinu, kotoryye chitayut yemu, no uporstvuyet v neverii i nadmenno otnositsya k vere, kak budto i ne slyshal ikh. Obraduy zhe yego, o prorok, muchitel'nym nakazaniyem, poskol'ku on nastoychivo sovershayet durnyye deyaniya, vedushchiye k nemu
